heading: HB06661
0:
AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE SECRETARY OF EDUCATION TO POSTPONE THE START OF SCHOOL YEAR IN CASE OF A DECLARATION OF A STATE OF EMERGENCY, STATE OF CALAMITY OR SIMILAR OCCURRENCE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7977, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS “AN ACT TO LENGTHEN THE
SCHOOL CALENDAR FROM TWO HUNDRED (200) DAYS TO NOT
MORE THAN TWO HUNDRED TWENTY (220) CLASS DAYS”
principal-authors: VILLANUEVA, EDUARDO "BRO. EDDIE" C.; RIVERA, DOMINGO C.;
mother-bill statusstatus: House adopted Senate Bill as amendment to House Bill on 2020-06-04 Substituted by HB06895
